title: ‘On the Tourmalet, everything can happen’: Tour de France Femmes prepares for historic day
content:
Alison Jackson hoping for some food-based gifts from fans, including but not limited to, hamburgers and chicken wings.

Read the full article at ‘On the Tourmalet, everything can happen’: Tour de France Femmes prepares for historic day on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
